import './App.css' import { BrowserRouter as Router, Route, Switch } from 'react-router-dom' import styled from 'styled-components' import Chat from './components/Chat' import Login from './components/Login' import Header from './components/Header' import Sidebar from './components/Sidebar' import db from './firebase' function App() { const getChannels = () => { db.collection('rooms').onSnap } return (
) } export default App const Container = styled.div` width: 100%; height: 100vh; display: grid; grid-template-rows: 38px auto ` const Main = styled.div` display: grid; grid-template-columns: 260px auto `
